- [百度地图（40）-GL 路书](https://www.cnblogs.com/googlegis/p/14707804.html)

1. 三维动画里的路书，原理和二维类似，取到一段路线数据，动画移动。

2. 三维里的路书使用的是 BMapGLLib.LuShu

3. 代码参考

```js
function startLushu() {
    var fly = 'data:image/png;base64,';
    lushu = new BMapGLLib.LuShu(map, polyline.getPath(), {
      geodesic: true,
      autoCenter: true,
      icon: new BMapGL.Icon(fly, new BMapGL.Size(48, 48), { anchor: new BMapGL.Size(24, 24) }),
      speed: 1000000,
      enableRotation: true
    });
    setTimeout('lushu.start()', 4000);
  }
```

4. 页面显示

![img](https://img2020.cnblogs.com/blog/59231/202104/59231-20210427101734760-1453353999.png)

5. 源码地址
